definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.chinese: 路得对婆婆的忠诚并不耀目。

sentences.english: Then she said, Let me find favour in thy sight, my lord;
sentences.chinese: 路得说，我主阿，愿在你眼前蒙恩。

sentences.english: Then she said, Let me find favor in thy sight, my lord;
sentences.chinese: 路得说，我主阿，愿在你眼前蒙恩。

sentences.english: How much formal authority did Mohandas Gandhi and Martin Luther King Jr. have?
sentences.chinese: 甘地和马丁。路得金有多少权力？

sentences.english: "May I continue to find favor in your eyes, my lord," she said.
sentences.chinese: 路得说，我主阿，愿在你眼前蒙恩。

sentences.english: So she went out and began to glean in the fields behind the harvesters.
sentences.chinese: 路得就去了，来到田间，在收割的人身后拾取麦穗。

sentences.english: When you come to the corner of the road , turn right and you'll see a hotel .
sentences.chinese: 当你来到路得角落处，右转，你就会看到旅馆。

sentences.english: This one daughter-in-law means more to Naomi than seven sons.
sentences.chinese: 对拿俄米来说，拥有路得这个媳妇比有七个儿子更好。

sentences.english: But this is only the beginning of a story of the girl named Ruth.
sentences.chinese: 上述的一切只是我们认识路得这个女子的开始。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
